Verify on hover, the 'Products' navigation link color changes to #007bff, background color to rgba(0,0,0,0.05), and cursor is 'pointer'
Verify the first product card has width 300px, height 450px, background color #ffffff, border-radius 8px, and box-shadow '0px 2px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)'
Verify the product title displays 'Stylish Leather Bag' with type size 20px and color #1a1a1a
Verify the price text is '£120.00' with font weight 700
Verify the product image source is 'bag_001.jpg' and its alt text is 'Premium leather shoulder bag'
Verify the 'Add to Cart' button is visible with background color #28a745 and border-radius 4px
Access the 'Contact Us' form

Verify the 'Email' input field has placeholder text 'Enter your email address', width 250px, height 40px, border 1px solid #cccccc, border-radius 4px, font size 16px, font family 'Arial', text color #333333, background color #f8f8f8, aria-label 'Email address input', is a required field, and has display 'block'
Verify when the 'Email' input field is focused, its border color changes to #007bff
Trigger the confirmation modal
Verify the modal is visible with z-index 1000 and the background overlay has opacity 0.5
Verify the dialog width is 400px, height 200px, positioned top 50% and left 50% (with transform for centering)
Verify the title text is 'Confirm Action' with font weight 600
Verify the content displays 'Are you sure you want to proceed?'
Verify the 'Confirm' button has text 'Confirm', color #ffffff, and background color #dc3545
Verify the 'Cancel' button displays 'Cancel' and has background color #6c757d
Verify the main carousel image has natural dimensions 1920x1080px, rendered dimensions 100% width and 500px height, is loaded, and loads within 500ms
Verify the current image source is 'carousel_01.jpg'
Click the 'Next' arrow
Verify the image source changes to 'carousel_02.jpg'
Verify the 'Next' and 'Previous' arrow buttons are visible and have color #ffffff
Verify the transition duration for image change is 800ms
Verify the carousel container has box-shadow '0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.2)' and overflow 'hidden'
Navigate to 'https://example.com/privacy'

Verify the copyright text '© 2023 Example Co.' is displayed, uses 'Open Sans' font family, text size 14px, color #6c757d, letter spacing 0.5px, line height 20px, text align 'center', padding 20px 0px, background color #f8f9fa, and display 'block' occupying full width
Verify the 'Next' pagination button is enabled, displays 'Next', has width 80px, height 36px, background color #007bff, text color #ffffff, font weight 600, border-radius 4px, and border 'none'
Click the 'Next' pagination button
Verify the URL changes to 'https://example.com/search?page=2'
Verify the current page button changes its background color to #6c757d
Open the user dropdown menu
Verify the 'My Profile' item is visible, displays 'My Profile', has padding 8px 15px, font size 15px, initial text color #212529, background color transparent, display 'block', and line height 22px
Verify on hover, the 'My Profile' item background color changes to #e9ecef and cursor is 'pointer'
Verify the first data row (order ID 'ORD-001') has background color #f2f2f2
Verify each cell in the first data row has padding 12px
Verify the 'Order Date' cell displays a valid timestamp in 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS' format
Verify the 'Status' cell displays 'Delivered' in green color rgb(40,167,69) with font weight 600
Verify the 'Total' cell displays '£150.00' with text align 'right'
Trigger the success alert
Verify the banner is visible for 5 seconds, positioned at top 0px, and has width 100%
Verify the banner background color is #d4edda, border color #c3e6cb, padding 15px 20px, border-radius 4px, and z-index 999
Verify the text 'Successfully saved!' is displayed with font size 16px and color #155724
Verify the 'Play' button is visible, has width 40px, height 40px, and displays a play icon using a 'font awesome' font
Verify the progress bar is visible and has background color #e0e0e0 with fill color #ff0000 at 25% for 30s
Verify the 'Mute' button is enabled and the video is initially not muted
Verify the 'Fullscreen' button is visible and has aria-label 'Toggle fullscreen'

Verify the 'Facebook' social icon is visible, has width 32px, height 32px, SVG fill color #1877f2, border-radius 50%, links to 'https://www.facebook.com/example', and has aria-label 'Visit us on Facebook'
Verify on hover, the 'Facebook' social icon scale transforms to 'scale(1.1)' with transition duration 200ms
Verify the progress bar container has width 400px, height 20px, background color #e9ecef, and border-radius 10px
Verify the inner progress bar element has background color #007bff, current width 75%, and animated transition for 500ms
Verify the progress bar text content displays '75%' with color #ffffff and font size 12px
Click to expand the first accordion item

Verify the header element displays 'Item 1', has background color #f8f9fa, padding 15px, border bottom 1px solid #dee2e6, font weight 600, font size 18px, cursor 'pointer', text color #212529, and letter spacing 0.5px
Verify after expansion, the expand icon rotates 'rotate(90deg)' for 300ms
Verify after expansion, the adjacent content element transitions its height from 0px to 300px in 400ms
Scroll down 500px on 'https://example.com/longpage'
Verify the 'Scroll to Top' button appears, is fixed position bottom 20px and right 20px, has background color #007bff, width 50px, height 50px, border-radius 50%, icon color #ffffff, and z-index 900
Click the 'Scroll to Top' button
Verify the window scroll-top becomes 0 and the transition takes 300ms
Verify the code block element has background color #f4f4f4, padding 15px, border-radius 5px, and overflow x 'auto'

Verify the code block element has font family 'monospace', font size 14px, text color #333333, line height 20px, word spacing 2px, letter spacing 0.1px, and text content 'function helloWorld() { ... }'

Verify the 'Sales' legend item is visible, displays 'Sales' as text, has a corresponding color swatch with background color #28a745, font size 14px, font weight 500, text color #333333, display 'flex', icon width 16px, icon height 16px, cursor 'default', and margin-right 10px
Open the date picker
Verify the current day cell ('26') has background color #007bff, text color #ffffff, border-radius 50%, width 32px, height 32px, font weight 700, and aria-label 'October 26, 2023'
Verify other month days are dimmed with opacity 0.6 and have color #cccccc
Verify the selected date value is '2023-10-26'
Trigger a toast notification

Verify the toast notification appears at bottom-right (right 20px, bottom 20px), is visible for 3 seconds, has width 300px, height auto, background color #343a40, text color #ffffff, border-radius 8px, padding 15px, box-shadow '0px 0px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.2)', and opacity 1
Verify the message 'Item added to cart!' is displayed with font size 16px
Set viewport width to 768px

Verify the hamburger menu icon is visible, has width 30px, height 24px, lines color #333333, display 'block', cursor 'pointer', aria-label 'Open navigation menu', and position 'absolute' relative to its offset-parent
Click the hamburger menu icon
Verify the navigation menu max-height changes from 0px to 300px with a transition of 300ms
Navigate to 'https://www.example.com/'
Verify the header element has background-color #1a2b3c, height 60px, and display 'flex'
Verify the 'Home' link has text color #ffffff, font size 16px, and padding 10px 15px
Verify the 'About Us' link has margin-right 20px
Verify on hover, the 'About Us' link becomes active with background-color #4c5d6e and border-bottom 2px solid #00ff00
Verify the transition duration for hover states is 200ms ease-in
Verify the site logo image 'logo.png' is visible with rendered dimensions 150x40px and alt text 'Company Logo'
Verify primary navigation links have cursor 'pointer'
Verify the first product card has width 280px, height 380px, border-radius 8px, and box-shadow '0px 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)'
Verify the product image 'product_shoe.jpg' is loaded, has natural dimensions 800x600px, and accessibility description 'Stylish Running Shoe'
Verify the product title 'Elite Runner' has text size 20px, foreground color #333333, and font-weight 600
Verify the 'Add to Cart' button is visible, has background-color #007bff, text color #ffffff, and padding 12px 24px
Access the 'Contact Us' form

Verify the 'Email' input field has placeholder text 'your.email@example.com', width 300px, height 40px, border 1px solid #cccccc, border-radius 4px, font size 16px, text color #333333, aria-label 'Email address input field', and display 'block'
Verify that on focus, the 'Email' input field border color changes to #007bff and box-shadow is '0px 0px 0px 3px rgba(0,123,255,0.25)'
Verify footer links are displayed inline-block with foreground color #888888, font size 14px, and padding 5px 10px
Verify each footer link has margin-right 15px (except the last one)
Verify that on hover, footer link text color changes to #007bff with a transition of 150ms linear
Verify there are exactly 5 footer navigation links
Verify the 'Privacy Policy' link navigates to 'https://www.example.com/privacy'
Verify the copyright text is text-align 'center' horizontally
Trigger the 'Sign Up' modal

Verify the modal is visible, has z-index 1000, background-color #ffffff, width 500px, max-height 75vh, border-radius 10px, box-shadow '0px 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.3)', appears with fade-in animation duration 300ms ease-out, and overflow-y 'auto'
Verify the close button ('X' icon) is visible in the top right corner with font size 24px and text color #666666

Verify the user avatar image has source 'avatar_user.jpg', width 80px, height 80px, border-radius 50%, border 2px solid #007bff, accessibility description 'User Profile Picture', is clickable, has cursor 'pointer', and offset-left 20px from the left edge of its parent container
Trigger a 'Success' alert message
Verify the alert message has background color #d4edda, text color #155724, padding 15px 20px, border-radius 5px, opacity 1, display 'block', min-width 250px, and max-width 500px
Verify the message text is 'Your action was successful!'
Verify the close button '✕' is present on the right
Simulate a file upload to 75% completion
Verify the progress bar container has width 400px, height 20px, background color #e9ecef, border-radius 10px, and is positioned 'relative' to its parent
Verify the filled portion has width 75% of container, background-color #28a745, and height 100%
Verify the percentage text '75%' is displayed inside with text size 14px and text color #ffffff
Click the 'Settings' button
Verify the dropdown menu is visible, has background-color #ffffff, box-shadow '0px 2px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)', padding 8px 0px, and border-radius 4px
Verify there are exactly 3 list items in the dropdown menu
Verify each list item has padding 10px 15px
Verify each list item changes background-color to #f0f0f0 on hover with a transition of 100ms ease
Verify the 'Profile' item navigates to 'https://www.example.com/profile'
Load a video player

Verify the playback state is initially paused, volume status is not muted, current time display is '0:00', total duration is '2:30', video source is 'example_video.mp4', and the video element has display 'block'
Verify the play/pause controls are visible when not in fullscreen
Click the fullscreen button
Verify fullscreen mode is enabled, setting video display width to 100vw and display height to 100vh
Verify there are 5 page number buttons in the pagination component
Verify each page number button has text size 15px, foreground #007bff, padding 8px 12px, border 1px solid #dee2e6, and border-radius 4px
Verify the 'active' page button has background-color #007bff, text color #ffffff, and border-color #007bff
Verify the 'Previous' button is disabled when on page 1 and has opacity 0.6
Open the image carousel
Verify the image carousel displays 3 images, has width 800px, height 450px, and content overflow-x 'hidden'
Verify the 'Next' and 'Previous' navigation buttons are visible, positioned vertically centered on the sides, with background-color rgba(0,0,0,0.5) and color #ffffff
Verify the image transition animation duration is 500ms ease-in-out
Verify the active image has scale 1.05
Hover over the 'Info' icon

Verify the tooltip is visible, has background #333333, foreground #ffffff, padding 8px 12px, border-radius 4px, appears 10px below the 'Info' icon, has z-index 999, text content 'More information here.', and display 'block'
Verify the arrow element has fill #333333
Verify the first cell contains 'Item A', has text rendering size 14px, text color #333333, padding 10px, content alignment 'left', bottom edge line 1px solid #e0e0e0, and min-width 100px
Verify the 'Price' column cell contains '29.99', is text-align 'right', and has font-weight 500
Verify the table row contains exactly 4 cells
Open the sidebar navigation
Verify the sidebar has width 250px, background color #f8f9fa, position 'fixed' with left offset 0px, and display 'block'
Verify there are 6 navigation links

Verify on hover, each navigation link background-color changes to #e9ecef
Verify the active link has font-weight 700 and border-left 4px solid #007bff
Verify the search input field has width 400px, height 45px, border-radius 22px, placeholder text 'Search products...', and margin-bottom 20px
Verify the search icon is visible on the left with color #888888
Verify the 'Search' button has text 'Search', background-color #007bff, and text color #ffffff
Submit the search form
Verify submitting the form redirects to 'https://www.example.com/search?query=test'
Verify the notification bell icon is visible, has icon color #666666, font size 24px, and cursor 'pointer'

Verify a red badge with notification count '3' is displayed at its top-right corner, has background-color #dc3545, text color #ffffff, font size 12px, border-radius 50%, and is absolutely positioned with top position -8px and right position -8px relative to the bell icon
Verify the hero section banner image is 'url(hero_banner.jpg)', has background coverage 'cover', visual height 500px, and filter 'brightness(70%)'
Verify the main title text 'Discover Your Next Adventure' has text size 48px, text color #ffffff, and font-weight 700
Verify the call-to-action button 'Explore Now' has background-color #ffc107, text color #333333, and padding 15px 30px
Verify the 'Remember Me' checkbox status is initially unchecked
Verify its associated text is 'Remember Me' with font size 15px and text color #333333
Verify there is margin-right 8px between the checkbox input and its label
Verify the checkbox input itself is 18px wide and 18px high, is enabled, clickable, and has cursor 'pointer'
Verify on focus, the checkbox outline is 2px dotted #007bff
Verify the content area with class 'scroll-container' has overflow-y 'scroll', height 400px, max-height 600px, padding 20px on all sides, and initial scroll-top 0
Verify the scrollbar width is 10px and its track background-color is #f1f1f1
Verify the content within 'scroll-container' remains visible without overflow-x issues and its font family is 'Arial'
